projects.title: GCash - Finance Super App
projects.description: GCash is an all-in-one mobile wallet that lets you send money, pay bills, shop, invest, borrow, and more—anytime, anywhere. Enjoy free GCash-to-GCash transfers, Send to Many, and fund transfers to banks and e-wallets like Maya, BPI, BDO, UnionBank, LandBank, Metrobank, and Chinabank, with saved details for faster future transactions. Buy load for all networks, access exclusive Globe and TM offers, and pay 400+ billers with options for reminders and recurring payments. Scan to Pay via QR at thousands of merchants locally and abroad, shop online securely, and link subscriptions directly to app stores. Eligible users can access credit options like GCredit, GLoan, GGives, and Borrow Load (loan products powered by Fuse Financing Inc., SEC-registered). Grow your money with GSave, GStocks, GFunds, and GCrypto, and stay protected with affordable insurance options. Cash in online or over the counter nationwide, and even help plant real trees by earning Green Energy points through transactions. GCash makes everyday financial tasks simple, secure, and accessible for Filipinos.
projects.techStack: Kotlin, Clean Architecture, MVVM, Retrofit, Room, Biometric Auth, Payment Security

projects.title: OANDA - Global Trading
projects.description: OANDA promotes its award-winning, user-friendly mobile forex trading app for active traders in the U.S. The app allows users to trade major and minor currency pairs (such as EUR/USD, USD/CAD, USD/JPY, AUD/USD, and GBP/USD) with tight spreads, low commissions, real-time quotes, and advanced charting tools. Key features include: Fast order execution and real-time notifications, customizable interface and risk management tools, ability to place trades directly from charts, access to 50+ technical analysis tools, market news, economic calendars, and trading signals. OANDA highlights its regulatory compliance, transparency, global presence, and multilingual 24/5 customer support. The ad encourages users to download the free app, apply for an account, fund it, and start trading, while noting that forex margin trading is high risk and may result in losses exceeding the initial investment.
projects.techStack: Kotlin, WebSockets, RxJava, Custom Charting, Real-time Networking, Material Design

projects.title: coinpass - Crypto Exchange
projects.description: Buy, sell and trade crypto assets on the go with coinpass*, the all-in-one crypto investing platform for UK businesses. With our crypto trading app you can seamlessly buy, sell, and trade digital assets and manage your crypto portfolio in a fully secure environment. Invest with confidence, convenience and speed. Voted the best corporate cryptocurrency exchange platform at CityAM's prestigious CryptoAM Awards, we’re the trusted UK crypto exchange for corporate investors. Our tailored business crypto solutions provide the market access, investment instruments and enterprise-grade security that you need, all within one convenient, centralised platform. Personalise your coinpass corporate crypto account to suit your trading style and schedule. You can trade over 85+ different crypto trading pairs in GBP, EUR, USDC, USDT, BTC & ETH with new pairs added all the time.
projects.techStack: Kotlin, Coroutines, Dagger Hilt, Biometric Security, KYC Integration, Secure Data Storage

projects.title: myCWT - Business Travel
projects.description: The essential travel companion for business travelers worldwide. Features flight and hotel bookings, real-time itinerary updates, and 24/7 support. Streamlined travel management for global organizations through a user-centric mobile interface.
projects.techStack: Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Google Maps API, Push Notifications, Offline Sync, Internationalization

projects.title: Modirum ID & Authentication
projects.description: Advanced payment security and strong customer authentication (SCA). Developed the 3-D Secure 2.0 SDK and authentication app used by banks globally to prevent fraud and ensure secure digital payments during high-risk transactions.
projects.techStack: Security Hardening, Cryptography, SDK Development, JWS/JWE, Biometric Auth, ISO 20022

projects.title: CIVIL SERVICE REVIEWER
projects.description: Civil Service Exam Reviewer is a comprehensive review app designed to help aspiring candidates prepare effectively for the Civil Service Exam (CSE). Covering both Sub-Professional and Professional levels, the app features a regularly updated question database, realistic practice tests, instant performance feedback, detailed analytics, and a helpful registration guide. With its user-friendly interface and expertly crafted review materials, it enables users to strengthen key areas, improve test-taking skills, and build confidence—making it a reliable companion for achieving success in the Civil Service Exam.
projects.techStack: Kotlin, Firebase, Room, Jetpack Compose, Google Ads, In-App Purchases

projects.title: Play To Learn: Periodic Table
projects.description: Play To Learn: Periodic Table is an engaging educational app designed to make learning chemistry interactive, enjoyable, and easy to understand. Featuring a fully interactive periodic table, users can tap on each element to explore detailed information such as atomic number, symbol, atomic weight, electron configuration, properties, history, uses, and orbital diagrams. The app also includes 3D atomic structure visualization to better understand electron arrangements, along with fun and educational quizzes to reinforce learning. With its intuitive interface and visually appealing design, it’s perfect for students, educators, and science enthusiasts who want to study at their own pace. This initial release marks the beginning of more exciting updates and features to come, making it a growing companion for anyone eager to explore the wonders of chemistry.
projects.techStack: Kotlin, Maps SDK, QR Scanning, Payment Gateway, Real-time Tracking, Firebase

projects.title: MLBB Game Guide
projects.description: MLBB Game Guide is a comprehensive companion app designed to help players improve their gameplay and strategy in Mobile Legends: Bang Bang. It provides detailed hero information, item builds, emblems, battle spells, rankings, tier lists, and drafting strategies—all in one convenient platform. With organized and easy-to-navigate data, users can explore hero stats and roles, compare items, learn optimal emblem and spell usage, track the current meta, and even simulate team drafts to practice compositions and counters. Regularly updated for accuracy and relevance, the app offers a simple, user-friendly experience for players of all skill levels.
projects.techStack: Interactive UI, Lottie Animations, API Integration, Social Features, Real-time Stats

projects.title: Ultimate LTO Exam Reviewer
projects.description: Ultimate LTO Exam Reviewer is a comprehensive review app designed to help aspiring candidates prepare effectively for the Land Transportation Office (LTO) Exam. Covering both theoretical and practical driving knowledge, the app features a regularly updated question database, realistic practice tests, instant performance feedback, detailed analytics, and helpful resources for license application and renewal. With its user-friendly interface and expertly crafted review materials, it enables users to strengthen key areas, improve test-taking skills, and build confidence—making it a reliable companion for achieving success in the LTO Exam.
projects.techStack: Kotlin, Firebase, Room, Jetpack Compose, Google Ads, In-App Purchases

projects.title: Laundry Management System (LMS)
projects.description: A Laundry Management System (LMS) is a digital system used to manage laundry shop operations efficiently. It tracks customer orders, service types, pricing, pickup and delivery, payment transactions, and order status. The system helps organize workflow, reduce errors, monitor income, and improve customer service by providing accurate and real-time updates.
projects.techStack: Typescript, Laravel, React, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, Appointment Scheduling

projects.title: Clinic Management System (CMS)
projects.description: A Clinic Management System (CMS) is a system designed to efficiently manage and streamline the daily operations of a clinic. It facilitates patient registration, appointment scheduling, medical record management, prescription handling, and basic administrative tasks. The system enhances operational efficiency, minimizes manual paperwork, ensures accurate and secure record-keeping, and improves the overall quality of patient care and service delivery.
projects.techStack: JavaScript, PHP, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, MySQL, Appointment Scheduling
